name: prodeq2ad
params: setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0
body: |- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
bodyPretty: ⊢ (w0 → prod(s0 ∈ c0, c1)= prod(s0 ∈ c0, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wral(s0, c0, wceq(c1, c2)))
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wceq(cprod(s0, c0, c1), cprod(s0, c0, c2)))
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| wi(w0, wceq(c1, c2))
-| diffsw(s0, w0)

comment: Equality deduction for product. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 5-Apr-2020.)
